Server.Name: Age of Oblivion
Server.Description:
Age of Oblivion Alpha 4 Overhaul
Note: 3.0 will require a new save over the 2.8
This Mod is still in Development and you will most likely experience some bugs and a Balance issues.
Update Information can be found at https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23943-age-of-oblivion-alpha-25-new/ and on our Discord https://discord.gg/4UX3HZ7gka
Teaser: https://youtu.be/6FYPlzEl_60
Main Features:
Farming and Food! Many more Workstations Vehicle Overhaul New Creatures
3rd PArty Mods Included:
White River Tools of Citizenship Firearms Expansion Community Creature packs

Server.Name: Age of Oblivion Experimental
Server.Description: This is an experimental release of the upcoming Alpha 5 release of Age of Oblivion. This build is meant for testing purposes and may updated often. use only for testing purposes at your own Risk. This new version will require that you Create a new map with the Mod installed to make sure that the Custom Trader Outposts are generated correctly. A new game is required. If you chosse to test this build please join our discord and provide feedback https://discord.gg/J6C8K6Xs5x If you choose to stream or make content with this build please just make sure your audience is aware that this is a test build.
